about_the_game:
"In the far distant future, computer viruses threaten the world."

OVERVIEW


Play as David, an android living in the year 9001 A.D., determined to save the life of his android baby sister, Daisy, who has been infected by an unstoppable computer virus plaguing the world.



Hack into Daisy's mind and explore the realm of digital consciousness as a sentient computer program armed with an arsenal of unique weapons and abilities, as you fight through waves of relentless self-replicating enemies.

KEY FEATURES


  • Employ various weapons, abilities, and an innovative Assist Mode toggle system to customize your difficulty and play style
  • Traverse the depths of computer consciousness rendered in a unique 3D voxel art style
  • Dynamically switch between top-down, over-the-shoulder, and first-person ("Pilot Mode") perspective
  • Demo includes the first five levels; and save data will carry over into the main game

content_descriptors.notes: Brief image of an android girl with her bare top revealed as she's being diagnosed for sickness.
